channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Desktop Client for Windows, Zoom VDI Client for Windows, and Zoom Meeting SDK for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Desktop Client for Windows, Zoom VDI Client for Windows, and Zoom Meeting SDK for Windows

item.title: CVE-2024-24691|2024-09-20T14:48:21.535Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20windows%2C%20zoom%20vdi%20client%20for%20windows%2C%20and%20zoom%20meeting%20sdk%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper input validation in Zoom Desktop Client for Windows, Zoom VDI Client for Windows, and Zoom Meeting SDK for Windows may allow an unauthenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via network access.
